name: captcha_generator
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool captcha_generator.
Tool description: A captcha generator tool with different settings for difficulty.
API description: This is a captcha generator tool that gives you an image of 270x80 pixels and the text solution. It has different settings that allows you to configure the captcha difficulty, and even create a captcha with a custom text solution.

fontname.description: The font to be used for the CAPTCHA text. Supported font names are 'sora', 'noto-sans', and 'ubuntu'. Default is 'sora'.

noise_number.description: The amount of noise to include in the CAPTCHA image. Default is 10.

text.description: Custom text to be used as the CAPTCHA solution. If not provided, a random text solution will be generated.
